abstract: United Rusal’s upcoming Hong Kong initial public offering could value the world’s largest aluminum producer 16 percent cheaper than its biggest Chinese competitor, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: United Rusal’s upcoming Hong Kong initial public offering could value the world’s largest aluminum producer 16 percent cheaper than its biggest Chinese competitor, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: United Rusal‘s upcoming initial public offering in Hong Kong could value the world’s largest aluminum producer 16 percent lower than its biggest Chinese competitor, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Rusal I.P.O. Said to Value Shares Cheaper Than Rival
